channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken glass, 7th July
item.description:
Lots of broken glass outside 47 Blenheim Grove flats. No way to avoid it as pavement is narrow. Could it be cleared asap

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 59, Blenheim Grove, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light cut off by water company, 7th July
item.description:
Thames water fixed a problem in Bournewood Road last month. They cut the street light outside number 9 in half. This part of our street is now very dark at night. Are there plans to replace this light either where it is or close by?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bournewood Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over grown weeds on pavements and kerbside., 7th July
item.description:
Again this summer there is little or no maintenance in relation to the excessive weeds on the pavements and kerbsides in Warland road and surrounding area. This has been happening for a few years now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Warland Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sewage Smells, 7th July
item.description:
A venting manhole is allowing terrible sewage gases to be released on the corner of King Edwards Rd and Warneford St. This has been raised with Thames Water. The vent needs to be infilled or relocated as the smells are entering our home.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): King Edwards Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several piles of dog mess on communal grass, 7th July
item.description:
There are several piles of dog poo on both sides of the communal grass by woodsford house by the balconies and bedroom windows which causes a bad smell and flies when windows open. Residents are not cleaning up after thier dog and it gets left there so more dogs mess to. This is an on going issue
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Portland Street, Walworth, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Foot Path flooded for the last few years H&S issue, 7th July
item.description:
Was reported last year , and NOTHING was done . Having to walk on wet and slippery band , which is quite dangerous . So is anything going to be done this year ! Will escalate issue to local councillors/MP and social media. Feed up with this issue NOT being resolved FEED up

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sydenham Park, Forest Hill, London
